<< actxserver COM engine COM examples >>

actxserverlist

Get available ActiveX servers.

Syntax

l = actxserverlist()

Output argument

l

a 1 by 3cell of strings.

Description

l = actxserverlist() returns list of available servers.

Example

l = actxserverlist()

See also

actxcontrollist, actxserver.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
